Free trade agreement between Nicaragua and China beginsNicaragua and China on Monday formally started trading under a new free trade agreement, allowing the Central American country to export some 71% of its products into the largest Asian market and free of tariffs. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 18:33:53 GMT F6VBYJ3TCVJK3EW6Z3AU47KZGY https://www.reuters.com/world/free-trade-agreement- Between-nicaragua-china-begins-2024-01-01/Ismael Lopez世界
China Evergrande's EV share sale deal lapsesA share sale plan between China Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group , the electric vehicle arm of property developer China Evergrande , and U.S.-listed NWTN has lapsed, according to a Hong Kong stock exchange filing on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 13:05:20 GMT 4K66JPFPXFPL5HAG2JDSEJMMBM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-evergrandes-ev-share-sale-deal-lapses-2024-01-01/Summer Zhen世界中国
China's new home prices up in Dec for 4th straight month - surveyChina's new home prices rose for the fourth straight month in December, a private survey showed on Monday, buoyed by a slew of government support measures. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 10:57:27 GMT CXKTZ4WIPZM4PAXCRT2OJT5P44 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-new-home-prices-up-dec-4th-straight-month-survey-2024-01-01/Reuters世界中国
China's Xi, US President Biden exchange congratulations on 45 years of diplomatic tiesChina's President Xi Jinping exchanged congratulations with U.S. President Joe Biden on the 45th anniversary of diplomatic ties between the two countries, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 03:24:40 GMT 5I2XUBDZIBN6DMNEODKM4RYU7A https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-xi-us-president-biden-exchange-congratulations-45th-year-diplomatic-ties-2024-01-01/Liz Lee世界
Taiwan president says ties with China must be decided by will of the peoplePeace must be based on "dignity", President Tsai Ing-wen said on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 02:14:30 GMT UDME3OP7GVIUXFSEMKOIFN2HZ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-says-ties-with-china-must-be-decided-by-will-people-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
North Korea Kim Jong Un, China's Xi exchange message vowing closer ties, Yonhap reportsNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un and Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed to further develop relationship of cooperation between the two countries, in New Year messages exchanged on Monday, South Korea's Yonhap news reported citing the North's state radio. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 21:57:28 GMT GNPQ4R5W6FJWLPKQVAAE3KR7C4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-kim-jong-un-chinas-xi-exchange-message-vowing-closer-ties-yonhap-2023-12-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
